law.catch_line: The State Board may investigate or act in a disciplinary proceeding against a licensed master electr...
law.text:
The State Board may investigate or act in a disciplinary proceeding against a licensed master electrician notwithstanding:
a lapse, by operation of law, of the State license of the master electrician;
a suspension of the State license of the master electrician by order of the State Board or a court; or
a voluntary surrender of the State license of the master electrician to the State Board.
